description: Search and explore academic profiles from YÖK Akademik. Retrieve structured profile details and collaborators to support research discovery, hiring, and networking.

capabilities.name: health_check
capabilities.description: Health check for the MCP server

capabilities.name: mcp_test
capabilities.description: Test tool for MCP connectivity verification

capabilities.name: search_profile
capabilities.description:
YÖK Akademik platformunda akademisyen profili ara (batch desteği ile)

Args:
    name: Aranacak akademisyen adı
    batch_size: Her batch'te işlenecek maksimum profil sayısı (varsayılan: 20)
    start_batch: Başlanacak batch numarası (varsayılan: 0)
    max_batches: Maksimum batch sayısı (varsayılan: 5)

Returns:
    Session bilgisi ve batch parametreleri

capabilities.name: get_profile
capabilities.description: Get detailed profile information from a session

capabilities.name: get_collaborators
capabilities.description:
Get collaborators for a specific profile from search results
Returns immediately with processing status, actual scraping happens in background

capabilities.name: get_collaborators_status
capabilities.description: Check the status of collaborator scraping for a session
